subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Betsy Andreu watched Lance Armstrong’s interview with Oprah Winfrey, waiting in vain for Armstrong to say that she and her husband were not liars.
snippet: Betsy Andreu watched Lance Armstrong’s interview with Oprah Winfrey, waiting in vain for Armstrong to say that she and her husband were not liars.
